'''Edmund Hess''' (1843 – 1903) was a [[Germany|German]] [[mathematician]] who discovered several [[regular polytope]]s.

==See also==
* [[Schläfli–Hess polychoron]]
* [[Hess polytope]]

== References ==
* ''[[Regular Polytopes (book)|Regular Polytopes]]'', (3rd edition, 1973), Dover edition, ISBN 0-486-61480-8 (p. 286)[http://books.google.com/books?id=iWvXsVInpgMC&pg=PA286&lpg=PA286&dq=%22Edmund+Hess%22+polytope&source=bl&ots=z4Fk6td4f6&sig=Xb_V6M4DxROS41WaJ-JRYuKoLoY&hl=en&ei=P060StDgOo-MMaakgdoO&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=8#v=onepage&q=%22Edmund%20Hess%22%20polytope&f=false]
* '''Hess''' ''E Uber die regulären Polytope höherer Art'', Sitzungsber Gesells Beförderung gesammten Naturwiss Marburg, 1885, 31-57
